title: League on Mac
body: Does League work on mac anymore? I remember i tried to download it on my little sister's computer and it would not work. And now I tried to reinstall on my mac after hvaing patching issues. And it's having the same issue as it did before on my sister's computer.

replies.body: What exactly is going wrong with your installation? The steps we take to get that figured out vary pretty widely depending on what specifically happens or what errors you see.
It was the software! I updated to High Sierra Mac and now it's finally patching! Hurray!
